item.title: Revisit_OS
item.description: For some reason, I’ve been reviewing OS related stuff lately.

item.title: Tofel
item.description: English is an important skill. Recently I’ve been learning English for my TOFEL. I hope all goes well. My vocabulary is a little poor. Now I am going to learn more words. The main purpose of writing this article is to make Study category not empty. :)

item.title: Using Cpp17 or higher version of Cpp on Vscode extension Clangd
item.description: Recently I switched my code completion tool in VScode from Microsoft’s official plugin to clangd. On the one hand, clangd can provide a better user experience, on the other hand, I also use this plugin in my company. I joked to myself: Two of the most interesting things I learned when I interned at the company were that indentation changed from four spaces to two, and braces changed from wrap to no wrap.

item.title: First Post
item.description: 新博客 决定把博客切换到hugo。也算是人生路上一个新的开始。
